title: BRIEF-Telemasters Says FY Results Will Be Better Than Initially Expected
text:
BRIEF-Telemasters Says FY Results Will Be Better Than Initially Expected

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 27, 2019 17:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Telemasters Says FY Results Will Be Better Than Initially Expected Sept 27 (Reuters) - Telemasters Holdings Ltd : * JSE: TLM - UPDATED TRADING STATEMENT * TELEMASTERS - FOR YEAR ENDED 30 JUNE 2019, HEPS AND EPS WILL BE 2.48 CPS, BEING 66% LOWER THAN EPS OF 7.38 CPS AND HEPS OF 7.36 CPS FOR YEAR * TELEMASTERS HOLDINGS LTD - FY RESULTS WILL BE BETTER THAN INITIALLY EXPECTED

BRIEF-Telemasters Says FY Results Will Be Better Than Initially Expected
description: BRIEF-Telemasters Says FY Results Will Be Better Than Initially Expected
